Your husband does require urgent medical attention with this open sore.A 2" diameter open wound is a fair size and as it is oozing a bloody discharge seems that this is infected.Any wound on a person with diabetes should not be neglected no matter how small.  Wounds do not heal very well in people with diabetes and neglected wounds can end up being very dangerous to the detrimental health of the person.Make an urgent appointment to see your doctor for a swab to be taken of the wound and for an antibiotic to be prescribed urgently.
